    Early Life Adversity and Cognitive Ability

    icar_data.Rd

    An unpublished experiment looking at the effect priming economic threat and childhood adversity on International Cognitive Ability Resource (ICAR) scores

    Usage

    icar_data

    Format

    A data frame with 413 rows and 63 variables:

    sample

    Lab or online subsample

    condition

    Experimental condition, 0 = control (computer crash); 1 = experimental (recession)

    dems_gender

    What gender do you identify with?

    dems_age

    What is your AGE in years? (e.g. 25)

    dems_ethnicity

    What is your ethnicity?

    dems_edu

    What is the highest level of education you have completed?

    dems_us_born

    Did you grow up in the United States?

    dems_english_native

    Did you grow up speaking English?

    dems_fluency

    How fluent are you with the English language?

    dems_lang

    Is English the language you know best?

    child_unp_obj1

    How many times did your parents or legal guardians change jobs or occupational status?

    child_unp_obj2

    How many times did you move or change residence (move to a different house, neighborhood, city, or state)?

    child_unp_obj3

    How many times were there changes in your familial circumstances? (divorce, parents starting new relationships, parents leaving the home)

    child_unp_changes1

    Economic status:

    child_unp_changes2

    Family environment:

    child_unp_changes3

    Your childhood neighborhood environment:

    child_unp_changes4

    Your childhood school environment:

    child_unp_subj1

    My family life was generally inconsistent and unpredictable from day-to-day.

    child_unp_subj2

    My parent(s) frequently had arguments or fights with each other or other people in my childhood.

    child_unp_subj3

    My parents had a difficult divorce or separation during this time.

    child_unp_subj4

    People often moved in and out of my house on a pretty random basis.

    child_unp_subj5

    When I woke up, I often didn't know what could happen in my house that day.

    child_unp_subj6

    My family environment was often tense and "on edge".

    child_unp_subj7

    Things were often chaotic in my house.

    child_unp_subj8

    I had a hard time knowing what my parent(s) or other people in my house were going to say.

    child_ses_subj1

    I grew up in a relatively wealthy neighborhood.

    child_ses_subj2

    I felt relatively wealthy compared to the other kids.

    child_ses_subj3

    My family usually had enough money for things when I was growing up.

    child_income

    What was your household income when you were growing up?

    unp_obj_mean

    Childhood unpredictability (objective) mean score

    unp_changes_mean

    Childhood unpredictability (changes) mean score

    unp_subj_mean

    Childhood unpredictability (subjective) mean score

    ses_subj_mean

    Childhood socioeconomic status (objective) mean score

    vr_04

    Verbal reasoning item 4

    vr_17

    Verbal reasoning item 17

    ln_07

    Letter-number item 7

    ln_58

    Letter-number item 58

    mx_45

    Matrix reasoning item 45

    mx_46

    Matrix reasoning item 46

    r3d_06

    Mental Rotation item 6

    r3d_08

    Mental Rotation item 8

    vr_16

    Verbal reasoning item 16

    vr_19

    Verbal reasoning item 19

    ln_33

    Letter-number item 33

    ln_34

    Letter-number item 34

    mx_47

    Matrix reasoning item 47

    mx_55

    Matrix reasoning item 55

    r3d_03

    Mental Rotation item 3

    r3d_04

    Mental Rotation item 4

    ln_sum

    Total score (out of 4) on the letter-number items

    mx_sum

    Total score (out of 4) on the matrix reasoning items

    vr_sum

    Total score (out of 4) on the verbal reasoning items

    r3d_sum

    Total score (out of 4) on the 3d rotation items

    icar_sum

    Total score (out of 16) on the ICAR battery

    time_condition

    Time in seconds the experimental manipulation displayed (should be about 60 seconds)

    time_icar

    Time in seconds it took to complete the whole ICAR battery

    time_ln

    Time in seconds it took to complete the lettter-number items

    time_mx

    Time in seconds it took to complete the matrix reasoning items

    time_vr

    Time in seconds it took to complete the verbal reasoning items

    time_r3d

    Time in seconds it took to complete the 3d rotation items

    att_interrupt

    Were you ever interrupted by anyone or anything during the time you spent on this survey?

    att_one_sitting

    Did you complete this survey in one sitting?

    att_getup

    Did you ever get up and leave your computer during the study (for any reason)?

    Source

    data_URL

    On this page
